title: Live activities toggle
custom_preconds: User should have a favorite team and notifications enabled.
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is on notifications page
AND taps on favorite team
THEN live activities auto track toggle should be displayed
AND user should be able to enable/disable it.

title: Enable/Disable all
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is on notifications page
AND taps on favorite team
THEN ENABLE/DISABLE ALL button should be displayed
WHEN user taps on that button
THEN all toggles should enable/disable but the live activities

title: Enable auto track by default (Negative)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has a device type and OS that supports Live Activities
AND they have a favorite or followed team(s) set
AND they have disabled notifications
WHEN download and open the MLB App
THEN auto track will not be enabled by default for their favorite team

title: Live activities auto track enabled logic (preview status)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has auto track enabled
WHEN a game enters the preview state (current date should be at least 2 hours before game start time)
AND they app has been in the foreground within the past 8 hours
THEN the live activity will be added to the users locks screen

title: Live activities auto track enabled logic (warmup status)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has auto track enabled
WHEN a game enters the warmup state (current date should be at least 2 hours before game start time)
AND they app has been in the foreground within the past 8 hours
THEN the live activity will be added to the users locks screen

title: Enable auto track by default
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has a device type and OS that supports Live Activities
AND they have a favorite or followed team(s) set
AND they have enabled notifications
WHEN download and open the MLB App
THEN auto track will be enabled by default for their favorite team

title: Live activities auto track enabled logic (Negative)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has auto track disabled
WHEN a game enters the preview state
AND they app has been in the foreground within the past 8 hours
THEN the live activity will not be added to the users locks screen

title: Live activities gadget removed
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has a device type and OS that supports Live Activities
AND live activities are enabled
AND user was able to see the live activities gadget
WHEN 3 hours have passed since game end
THEN the live activities gadget should be removed

title: Live activities update
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has a device type and OS that supports Live Activities
AND live activities are enabled
AND user was able to see the live activities gadget
WHEN the game advances
THEN the user should be reflected the game score and inning in real time.

title: Mid inning state
custom_steps:
GIVEN the game is between innings

WHEN displaying that information in the Live Activity

THEN hide count & base path details and display “Mid [Inning Number]”

title: Team At Bat Indicator
custom_steps:
GIVEN a live activity is not between inning (but rather in the middle of a live inning)

WHEN displaying the data on the platter

THEN add an indicator to the team that is at bat

title: Mid inning in play
custom_steps:
GIVEN the game is in play

WHEN displaying that information in the Live Activity

THEN display [bot/top][inning]
AND bases, count, and outs
AND at bat indicator pointing to the team that is currently at bat
AND pitcher and player at bat

title: Live activities auto track enabled logic (live status)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has auto track enabled
WHEN a game enters the live state
AND they send to the foreground
THEN the live activity will be added to the users locks screen

title: Live activities auto track enabled logic (delayed status)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has auto track enabled
WHEN a game enters the delayed state
AND they send to the foreground
THEN the live activity will be added to the users locks screen

title: Live activities auto track enabled logic (scheduled status)
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has auto track enabled
WHEN a game enters the scheduled state
AND they send to the foreground
THEN the live activity will be added to the users locks screen

title: Live Activities Warmup / Pregame Status Changes
custom_steps:
GIVEN a game is not in the Live or Final state / the game has not started yet

WHEN there are game state changes (e.g. pregame > warmup)

THEN do not display the game state change

AND just display the starting Pitcher last name for both team’s until the game starts and there is P/AB information to display

title: Live activities toggle
custom_preconds: User has a favorite team set in account settings
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user is on scores page

AND favorite team is about to play in the next 2 hours

WHEN user enables the track action item

AND refreshes the page

THEN the button should stay enabled

title: Live activities toggle availability
custom_preconds: User has a favorite team set in account settings
custom_steps:
GIVEN that user navigates to scores page
WHEN the current time is within 4.5 hours before game start
THEN game track button should be displayed
AND user should be able to enable it

title: Live Activities - Probable pitchers
custom_steps:
GIVEN a game is not in the Live or Final state / the game has not started yet

WHEN there are game state changes (e.g. pregame > warmup)

THEN do not display the game state change

AND just display the starting Pitcher last name for both team’s until the game starts and there is P/AB information to display

title: Game Transitions from Scheduled to Delayed or Postponed
custom_steps:
GIVEN a Live Activity is already on a users lockscreen

WHEN that game transitions from a scheduled state to a delayed state or postponed state

THEN we will display the updated game status on the platter of the Live Activity per the design

title: Display Starting Pitchers In Delayed State
custom_steps:
GIVEN a Live Activity has entered the delayed state

WHEN populating the chin of the live activity

THEN display the starting pitchers for both teams (as we do in a scheduled or warmup state)

title: LA Lock Screen - game is SCHEDULED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a scheduled state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND the game start time with AM/PM is displayed
AND user time zone is displayed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410447)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND the game start time with AM/PM is displayed
AND user time zone is displayed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410448)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game starts (when we receive a first update, should happen after the warm-up but before the first throw)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the LA card view changes to live

title: Live Activities -> Player Substitution
custom_preconds:
* User has application installed
* User has notifications enabled
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user's followed or favorite team is playing
AND user has live activities enabled for that game
WHEN a player is substituted in that game
THEN the user should see the player substitution on the lock screen activity display

title: LA Lock Screen - game is LIVE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game is live

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* light Live Activity card
* team logos
* current score underneath team logos
* current inning between team logos
* runner on bases graphic
* ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410451)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* dark Live Activity card
* team logos
* current score underneath team logos
* current inning between team logos
* runner on bases graphic
* ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410452)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game gets final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the LA card view changes to final

title: LA Lock Screen - game is DELAYED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a delayed state
custom_expected:
Delayed - 
game will be played today
game will not be scheduled again at a later date
game may still transition to a Postponed or Suspended status

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND 'Delayed Start' is displayed between the logos

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410491)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND 'Delayed Start' is displayed between the logos

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410661)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game gets live
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the LA card view changes to live

title: Live Activities -> Pitcher Change
custom_preconds:
* User has application installed
* User has notifications enabled
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user's followed or favorite team is playing
AND user has live activities enabled for that game
WHEN a pitcher is changed in that game
THEN the user should see the pitcher change on the lock screen activity display

title: LA Lock Screen - game is LIVE - DELAYED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has started but then got delayed
custom_steps:
Delayed -
game will be played today
game will not be scheduled again at a later date
game may still transition to a Postponed or Suspended status.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* light Live Activity card
* team logos
* current score underneath team logos
* current inning between team logos and 'Delayed' 
* runner on bases graphic
* ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410497)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* dark Live Activity card
* team logos
* current score underneath team logos
* current inning between team logos and 'Delayed' 
* runner on bases graphic
* ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410498)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN game starts again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN game starts from the inning that it got stopped

title: LA Lock Screen - game is POSTPONED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a postponed state
custom_expected:
Postponed
game has not started
game will not be played today
game will be scheduled again at a later date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND 'Postponed' is displayed between the logos

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410659)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND 'Delayed Start' is displayed between the logos

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410660)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page
Note: the LA card should only be displayed for about 4 hours in this case (iOS functionality)

title: LA Lock Screen - game is SUSPENDED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has started but got suspended
custom_expected:
Suspended
game has started
game will not be played today
game will be scheduled again at a later date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410667)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND current scores are displayed underneath the team logos
AND current inning and 'Suspended' between team logos
AND runner on bases graphic
AND ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410668)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is rescheduled at a later date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it will have a resumed status

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN / IF the game status changes to final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game will have a final-Early state (separate TC)

title: LA Lock Screen - game is RESUMED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a resumed state
custom_expected:
Resumed (Scheduled / Live / Final)
This is a game that was Suspended on a previous date.

We are treating resumed games as a new game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
AND game has scheduled state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND game time with the time zone
AND when game starts, it continues from the inning it was stopped on a previous day

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
AND game has scheduled state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND game time with the time zone
AND when game starts, it continues from the inning it was stopped on a previous day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN game starts
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the LA card view changes to live
AND it starts from the inning that they stopped

title: LA Lock Screen - game is CANCELLED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device

AND game has a cancelled state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game gets cancelled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN LA card disappears (happens immediately)
